meanings.definition: In a plump or rounded manner
meanings.sent1: She waddled chubbily across the room.
meanings.sent2: The baby moved chubbily as he tried to stand up.
meanings.sent3: The penguin chubbily slid on the ice, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The clouds moved chubbily across the sky, like fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent5: The squirrel chubbily climbed up the tree, its cheeks full of nuts.

meanings.definition: Having a pleasantly plump or rounded figure
meanings.sent1: The chubbily cat napped in the sun.
meanings.sent2: She had a chubbily face that always looked cheerful.
meanings.sent3: The chubbily teddy bear was the favorite toy of the little girl.
meanings.sent4: The chubbily clouds in the sky resembled cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: His chubbily cheeks turned rosy from the cold wind.
